title: 更新了模块化动力套装，然后就崩溃了
author: Bg~s影翼
txt_content:
崩溃报告如下：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// There are four lights!

Time: 15-10-4 下午2:26
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

numina是0.4.0.100---最新

replies.author: JSFWUJUFH
replies.txt_content: 先安装numina，运行一次，再安装mps，不行就换forge版本1448

replies.author: Bg~s影翼
replies.txt_content:
JSFWUJUFH 发表于 2015-10-4 16:27
先安装numina，运行一次，再安装mps，不行就换forge版本1448
只更新numina运行没问题
一更新MPS立马崩溃
还有，我forge就是1448的
